hero.title:
Reliable, secure IT.
Without the complexity.
hero.subtitle: We help organisations run well-governed technology environments - with clear ownership, predictable costs, and people who actually pick up the phone.

whoWeHelp.label: Who we help
whoWeHelp.title: Organisations that take technology seriously
whoWeHelp.intro: We work with businesses that understand IT is infrastructure, not overhead. Typically 20-200 people, often in professional services, healthcare, or finance - where reliability and security aren't optional.

growing.title: Growing businesses
growing.description: Outgrown the "IT guy" model. Need structure, documentation, and someone accountable for the whole environment.

compliance.title: Compliance-conscious
compliance.description: Financial services, healthcare, legal. Where governance and audit trails matter as much as uptime.

security.title: Security-aware
security.description: Boards asking about cyber risk. Insurance requiring controls. Need a partner who understands the threat landscape.

microsoft.title: Microsoft-invested
microsoft.description: Already on Microsoft 365 or Azure. Want it configured properly, secured correctly, and actively managed.

whatWeDo.label: What we do
whatWeDo.title: Run IT. Protect IT. Improve IT.
whatWeDo.intro: We take responsibility for your technology environment as a whole. One team, one relationship, clear ownership.

howWeWork.label: How we work
howWeWork.title: Predictable. Accountable. Human.
howWeWork.intro1: We've learned over twenty years that good IT isn't about heroics - it's about consistency. Systems monitored, changes planned, documentation maintained, people trained.
howWeWork.intro2: When something needs attention, you talk to someone who already knows your environment. Not a call centre. Not a ticket queue. Real people, in Auckland, who take ownership.

reviews.title: Quarterly reviews
reviews.description: Aligned to your business, not just tickets

trust.quote: "What stood out was the depth of thinking. They didn't just quote on what we asked for - they helped us understand what we actually needed, and why."
trust.quoteAuthor: Finance Director, Auckland professional services firm

cta.title: Ready to talk?
cta.subtitle: We'll have an honest conversation about what you need. If we're not the right fit, we'll tell you - and point you in the right direction.
cta.reassurance: No obligation. No sales pitch. Just a conversation about your situation.

hero.title:
Reliable, secure IT.
Without the complexity.
hero.subtitle: We help organisations run well-governed technology environments - with clear ownership, predictable costs, and people who actually pick up the phone.
